summary.para: Creates a media key session object using the specified initialization data and custom data. .

param.name: mimeType
param.para: The MIME type of the media container used for the content.

param.name: initData
param.para: The initialization data for the key system.

param.name: cb
param.para: The count in bytes of initData.

param.name: customData
param.para: Custom data sent to the key system.

param.name: cbCustomData
param.para: The count in bytes of cbCustomData.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the suspend notify interface of the Content Decryption Module (CDM).

param.name: notify
param.para: The suspend notify interface of the Content Decryption Module (CDM).

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the key system string the object was created with.

param.name: keySystem
param.para: The string name of the key system.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Shuts down the associated Content Decryption Module (CDM).

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Shutdown should be called by the application before final release. The Content Decryption Module (CDM) reference and any other resources is released at this point. However, related sessions are not freed or closed.

summary.para: Represents a media keys used for decrypting media data using a Digital Rights Management (DRM) key system.
